t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (A, B) = map(int, input().split())
    if A < B:
        (A, B) = (B, A)
    diff = A - B
    if diff % 2 == 0:
        d = diff // 2
        A -= d
        B += d
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')
    t -= 1
